## PayflowLinkTokenInput interface

Input required to fetch payment token information for Payflow Link and Payments Advanced payment methods.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PayflowLinkTokenInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cart\_id](./magento-api.payflowlinktokeninput.cart_id.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The unique ID that identifies the customer's cart |
